summary:
I am a passionate senior Business Consultant with over 24 years of experience in IT Service Management who has developed from Service Desk employee to Team Manager, ITIL Process Manager and Service Management & Business Consultant. Experienced in understanding and translating customer needs into appropriate (technical) solutions that match the existing process designs, which has resulted in more than 15 successful ServiceNow implementations. I am familiar with development working methods and collecting best practices and have compiled them into a best practice library to ensure quality and consistency throughout implementation projects. As a Scrum Master I am used to facilitating and leading a team to successful results. I am also perfectly capable of speaking in front of larger groups and getting a message across.

With my enthusiasm, humour, drive, and service- and result driven mindset I can bring every job to a positive result. Together with a team or on an individual assignment, I am at my best as a trusted advisor where I can help customers achieve objectives in the most efficient and effective way possible and build a relationship with my customers. In an employer I look for a place where people work together to achieve objectives and where an organizational chart is subordinate to delivering value. With each other and for each other!

education.degree_name: Certified ITIL v3 Intermediate Service Design

projects.title: DELA - DevOps ServiceNow
projects.description:
At Dela, I am part of a DevOps team responsible for the management and further development of the ServiceNow environment. Our scope includes managing the existing environment for Dela Belgium and driving the migration of the application management departments from Belgium to ServiceNow. Additionally, we are migrating the Dela Netherlands environment from TopDesk to ServiceNow, which involves integrating with TopDesk and Jira. Furthermore, we are currently working on implementing ITOM, CMDB, and CSDM functionalities within the ServiceNow platform.

My responsibilities encompass gathering functional requirements and translating them into both functional and technical requirements. I provide leadership to the DevOps team, deliver training sessions, and support the product owner. Ensuring alignment between user needs and the technical capabilities of ServiceNow is a crucial aspect of my role. By closely collaborating with the team, we ensure an efficient and effective implementation of ServiceNow across Dela. I also guide the team in tackling technical challenges and offer support for incidents and change requests.

I take pride in contributing to the successful management and ongoing development of the ServiceNow environment at Dela. It empowers the organization to optimize IT service management, streamline processes, and enhance collaboration among various departments. I am excited about the continuous growth and improvement of our ServiceNow implementation and look forward to achieving further successes in my role as a liaison between users and technology.

contributors.headline: ServiceNow Technical Lead & Development via Team Sofie
Entrepreneur / agile transformation leader / Pharma / Commercial & IT Value Stream Lead / Product Owner / Prog Mgr / ServiceNow digital transformation & BizDevOps

projects.title: de Volksbank - Procurement
projects.description:
At Volksbank's Procurement Department, I collaborated with a team of procurement specialists and developers to implement 3 custom apps in ServiceNow. 

Our goal was to automate the end-to-end process of intake, procurement, and contract management. These apps streamlined information gathering, approval workflows, and data capture, ensuring compliance with regulations. By centralizing and automating these processes, we achieved greater efficiency and accuracy in contract management. The apps facilitated in the retrieval of vital information and gathering all necessary approvals while also generating comprehensive reports for regulatory compliance. 

This project enhanced my business consultancy, teamwork, and implementation skills. I learned how to communicate and collaborate effectively with multidisciplinary teams, and I experienced the importance of continuously striving for improvement and optimization of business processes.

Being involved in this project has been a privilege, and I am excited about the opportunities it has created for the Volksbank. I look forward to leveraging the knowledge and experience gained from this project to tackle future challenges in digital transformation and process optimization.

projects.title: DPG Media - ServiceNow implementation
Nederlandse Loterij - Authorization Management
projects.description:
Business/Technical Consultant responsible for the technical implementation of authorization management in ServiceNow based on process of Nederlandse Loterij. Process in short: request roles and validation of roles via the portal (e.g. conflicting roles, roles already received, roles for different departments) followed by an approval workflow (e.g. user/manager approval, business role/application owner approval) resulting in tasks assigned and authorization records created and maintained.

Jessica’s responsibilities:
- Facilitate scrum team
- Gather requirements and translate to stories
- Configure ServiceNow
- Remote coordination of the scrum team (Covid-19)
- Plan and provide a demo containing all functionalities

projects.title: ParkNow - Data Analysis & Improvements
projects.description:

Jessica’s responsibilities:
- Analyse data in several systems
- Define processes followed in the current way of working
- Propose improvements
- Where possible, implement improvements

contributors.headline: ServiceNow Business Consultant at Ministerie van Defensie | CIS 3

profile_positions.description:
Team Sofie automates the work of IT professionals so that they can focus primarily on delivering value to the organization. We have a vision on the use of technology and innovation to realize far-reaching automation. We want to achieve more with market-leading platforms and optimize the IT value streams.  The digital transformation demands IT teams to deliver faster and faster. To realize this, it is important to use (innovative) technologies (Low-code, Workflow, RPA/API, AI) to relieve IT professionals of non-primary activities.

At Team Sofie we want to make an impact on what really matters to your organization. Investing in automation has a positive impact on themes such as: Continuous Compliance, Market Position, Cost Control, Employee Satisfaction. By applying automation within the IT supply chain, we enable our customers to use capacity more efficiently. IT professionals can spend more time on development and innovation. 

We understand and connect the world of IT professionals and IT leaders. Especially when it comes to IT automation. From professional to professional. No nonsense. No fuss. We always put the ambitions of our customers and their IT teams at #1. We work with professionals who have professional competence as their characteristic. Professionals who are good at what they do and who create pleasure and results in collaboration.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As Business Consultant I support clients during the implementation of new Service Management Systems. I am responsible for the translation of the functional requirements based on the processes and way of working of the client to the configuration of the Service Management System that is implemented. Mostly this is ServiceNow. Also support is provided in the area of processes and way of working to make sure these are effective and efficient and support the clients organization.

The last two years I was responsible for designing, setting up and managing the Platform Support Services department focused on technical ServiceNow Support. In this department my team was the single point of contact for over 30 customers, responsible for refining requirements and coordinate and execute assignments.

Setting up a best practice library and implementation method for implementations projects was also part of my resposibilities, as well as designing and providing (tailor-made) training courses both internal within Quint as for customers of Quint in the area of ServiceNow and Agile/Scrum.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As a team member involved in the implementation of a new data scheme for the KPN service management system.

Focus on onboarding of new/existing customers, contract translation to a configuration in the service management system, describing the way of working with regards to onboarding new/existing customers to the KPN service management system and provide training on this subject throughout the KPN Corporate Market organization
profile_positions.title: Senior Service Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Based on earlier gained experience I have created instructions & guidelines on how to implement new or existing customers in the KPN service management system.
Next to describing the process I have also created a training on this subject to share the knowledge with other service management consultants throughout our organization.

I also supported a number of implementations/migrations of customers to the KPN service management system by coaching the project members in the way of working.
profile_positions.title: Service Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As part of the transition team I was responsible for the Service Integration of a new customer. We had to bridge the gaps between the processes used by the customer and our own processes and translate the contracts of the customer with their (several) suppliers into a service structure used to configure the service management system with which this customer is supported, including interfaces with other suppliers. This configuration was then tested in a users acceptance test with the customer and involved suppliers. 

Also I have supported the customer during the data gathering process and with setting up agreements on how the services are delivered. To measure the satisfaction of the end user population we designed and implemented a customer satisfaction survey.
profile_positions.title: Service Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Together with project team designed and implemented a new, understandable and logic service structure to be used in the Service Management tooling of Getronics. This service structure has been setup from an end users perspective and provides the customer with logical reports (both service level and financial) and problem management with the necessary means to report on possible problems, and take actions accordingly.

This service structure has become the standard in our organization for all multi business line customers. The method is used for service structure implementation for different customers.

- Set up training for Service Management System

profile_positions.title: Service Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Building a simulation game with the goal to create process awareness within the Service desk organisation regarding the processes worked with in this environment (like incident and service request management).
In the game the students perform different roles (e.g. service desk employee, solver group, incident manager etc)
The game consists of four rounds in which incidents and service requests are issued at the service desk that need to be solved or executed. After each round an eveluation will take place.
This game helps the students to understand the importance of working via processes and the importance of communication throughout the delivery organisation, as well as reporting to the customer.
